    • loginByUsername

      @GetMapping(path="/loginByUsername") public User loginByUsername​(@RequestParam String key, @RequestParam String username, @RequestParam String password)
      GET-Method to verify login information
      Parameters:
      key - API-Key for authentication
      username - Username used to logging in
      password - Password used to logging in
      Returns:
      User information in a JSON format

      Returns:
      List of all users as a JSON format

      @PostMapping(path="/newUser") public String newUser​(@RequestParam String key, @RequestParam String username, @RequestParam String password)
      POST-Method to create a new user
      Parameters:
      key - API-Key for authentication
      username - Username for the account to be created
      password - Password for the account to be created
      Returns:
      Response code

      key - API-Key for authentication
      id - User ID to be deleted
